full_summary:
**Title:** Small Drone Demonstration and Purchase
**Reference Number:** PW-KIN-519-8685
**Solicitation Number:** W6399-23DB13/A
**Amendment Date:** 02 September 2022
**Publication Date:** 15 August 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** 07 September 2022, 14:00:00

### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the procurement of Class 1 (Under 150 kg) Unmanned Aircraft System (UAS) equipment and associated support services to support ongoing tests and evaluations in support of DND capability development.

### Procurement Strategy

The procurement will be conducted as a Competitive - Selective Tendering process, with trade agreements applicable under the Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canadian-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). The lowest price will be the selection criteria.

### Additional Information

* Suppliers interested in participating must be registered on the permanent list of suppliers or meet the qualification requirements to be considered for this procurement.
* A copy of the Request for Supply Arrangement W3048-21KJ89 can be downloaded from the Canada.ca website.
* Delivery will be made to the following regions: Ontario (except National Capital Region).

### Attachment

The procurement documents can be accessed on the Canada Buys website at the following links:
* [PDF 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/01/a317a7d4fbd9e326b0fccfda8418ca62/ABES.PROD.PW_KIN.B519.E8685.EBSU004.PDF)
* [PDF 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/30/d1f3f989c9acc50fea9d7affe8921688/ABES.PROD.PW_KIN.B519.E8685.EBSU003.PDF)
* [PDF 3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/16/e90b8a96161571a4b0330b97f7641cdc/ABES.PROD.PW_KIN.B519.E8685.EBSU001.PDF)
